sendQuest("::mb", 3033);//Line 8

sendQuest("::1v1", 3035);//Line 10

there?

item.title: CoOrDiNaTeS
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

it still gives me error

ill show u where i put it:

its in the end

[QUOTE]case 4150:
if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
customCommand(“gs”); //made by Musicmad441
}
break;
case 6004:
if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
customCommand(“armour”); //made by Musicmad441
}
break;
case 6005:
if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
customCommand(“pkbox”); //made by Musicmad441
}
break;
if(command.startsWith(“mypos”) && playerRights > 0){
sendMessage(“AbsX: “+absX+” AbsY: “+absY+””);
}

[/QUOTE]

item.title: CoOrDiNaTeS
item.dc:creator: @SonnyX SonnyX
item.description:
@SonnyX wrote:

Put something like this in your commands.java:

else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "[X]: " + p.absX + " [Y]: " + p.absY); }
